items.sentence: Can I ask that you don't interrupt me when I'm talking?
People still don't understand what's so bad about that.
That's not the main reason Tom ought to have done that.
Many of my problems wouldn't be so bad if I slept more.
I kind of want to eat something, but it's already late.
Would it be OK with you if I accepted Tom's invitation?
There's no need for you to tell me. I'm not interested.
They say you can judge people by the company they keep.
If you act like that, Tom will think that you hate him.
Tom always brings me a gift whenever he comes to visit.
